root.name: Slingstar
root.description: Overview You're the larger spaceship in this arena game. Your goal is to destroy the enemies by moving around, causing your wing men to zoom around you, colliding with enemies and causing they're destruction. You can't fire any weapons, only slingshot your allies around. There are some power ups in the game. Some may give you a couple wing men for a little while, or have your wing men fly around in a different way.
